verbs.description: [ARG1: ski instructor] [V: impaled] [ARG2: by 18-inch branch ouch] a ski instructor needed surgery after a tree branch impaled him in the lip forcing him to go to the hospital with the branch still sticking out of both sides of his mouth hagood natty hagood branch skiing
